condition.name: Amnesia
condition.resolution: Something problematic arises, such as a forgotten arrest warrant or old enemy

condition.name: Blind
condition.resolution: Limitation or difficulty that heightens immediate danger

condition.name: Broken
condition.beat: You back down from a confrontation or fail a roll due to this Condition. If you regain a dot of Integrity, lose another dot of Integrity, or achieve an exceptional success on a breaking point, you can shed this Condition.

condition.name: Crippled
condition.beat: Danger or severe inhibitation due to the disability

condition.name: Deprived
condition.resolution: Indulge in the deprived Vice, therapy.

condition.name: Fugue
condition.beat: You suffer the effects of this Condition. If you regain a dot of Integrity, lose another dot of Integrity, or achieve an exceptional success on a breaking point, you can shed this Condition.

condition.name: Guilty
condition.resolution: The character makes restitution for whatever he did; the character confesses his crimes.

condition.name: Informed
condition.resolution: Use the condition for its benefit.

condition.name: Inspired
condition.resolution: Use the condition for its benefit.

condition.name: Leveraged
condition.resolution: Shed the Condition as noted; turn the tables on the person.

condition.name: Madness
condition.beat: The character fails a roll because of this Condition. If you regain a dot of Integrity, lose another dot of Integrity, or achieve an exceptional success on a breaking point, you can shed this Condition.

condition.name: Mute
condition.beat: Limitation or communication difficulty that heightens immediate danger.

condition.name: Notoriety
condition.resolution: THe story is debunked or the character's name is cleared.

condition.name: Soulless
condition.resolution: This Condition is only resolved if the character regains her soul.
condition.beat: Gain a beat whenever the character loses Integrity because she indulged her Vice.

condition.name: Swooned
condition.resolution: Do something for the object that puts your character in danger; opt to fail a roll to resist a social action by the object.
